summary: This will replace Enderal's Righteous path weapons.Made to match my Armor of the Righteous Path replacer.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][b]
Replaces the Ebony models used as Righteous Path's weapons in Enderal.Made to match my [color=#00ffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82260/?]Armor of the Righteous Path replacer[/url] [/color]mod,so the latter is recommended.

[color=#ffff00][u]Credits:[/u][/color]

[color=#6aa84f]standalone09[/color]: 1h 2h Sword moders recourse.

[color=#6aa84f]TheUgin[/color]: Deer axe (one handed and two handed versions).

[color=#6aa84f]PrivateEye:[/color] Sixth House Bell Hammer http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17534/?

[color=#6aa84f]billyuro: [/color]Maurauder-mace.

[color=#efefef][color=#6aa84f]howiego08[/color]: Better Bows.

[color=#6aa84f]DMagnus:[/color] Artifacts of Ultima.

[color=#6aa84f]jet4571[/color]: 3 Medieval arrows.

Thank you all for your permissions to use your work in this mod!


[color=#ffff00][u]Tools used:[/u][/color]

Gimp.

Nifscope.

Skyrim Creation kit.


[/color]

[/b][/size]
author: Medtech

files.name: Weapons of the Righteous Path replacer
